00043 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00044 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00045 #include <lnet/lnetst.h>
00046 #include "console.h"
00047 
00048 static int
00049 lst_session_new_ioctl(lstio_session_new_args_t *args)
00050 {
00051         char      *name;
00052         int        rc;
00053 
00054         if (args->lstio_ses_idp   == NULL || /* address for output sid */
00055             args->lstio_ses_key   == 0 || /* no key is specified */
00056             args->lstio_ses_namep == NULL || /* session name */
00057             args->lstio_ses_nmlen <= 0 ||
00058             args->lstio_ses_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00059                 return -EINVAL;
00060 
00061         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_ses_nmlen + 1);
00062         if (name == NULL)
00063                 return -ENOMEM;
00064 
00065         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_ses_namep,
00066                            args->lstio_ses_nmlen)) {
00067                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_ses_nmlen + 1);
00068                 return -EFAULT;
00069         }
00070 
00071         name[args->lstio_ses_nmlen] = 0;
00072 
00073         rc = lstcon_session_new(name,
00074                                 args->lstio_ses_key,
00075                                 args->lstio_ses_feats,
00076                                 args->lstio_ses_force,
00077                                 args->lstio_ses_timeout,
00078                                 args->lstio_ses_idp);
00079 
00080         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_ses_nmlen + 1);
00081         return rc;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static int
00085 lst_session_end_ioctl(lstio_session_end_args_t *args)
00086 {
00087         if (args->lstio_ses_key != console_session.ses_key)
00088                 return -EACCES;
00089 
00090         return lstcon_session_end();
00091 }
00092 
00093 static int
00094 lst_session_info_ioctl(lstio_session_info_args_t *args)
00095 {
00096         /* no checking of key */
00097 
00098         if (args->lstio_ses_idp   == NULL || /* address for ouput sid */
00099             args->lstio_ses_keyp  == NULL || /* address for ouput key */
00100             args->lstio_ses_featp  == NULL || /* address for ouput features */
00101             args->lstio_ses_ndinfo == NULL || /* address for output ndinfo */
00102             args->lstio_ses_namep == NULL || /* address for ouput name */
00103             args->lstio_ses_nmlen <= 0 ||
00104             args->lstio_ses_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00105                 return -EINVAL;
00106 
00107         return lstcon_session_info(args->lstio_ses_idp,
00108                                    args->lstio_ses_keyp,
00109                                    args->lstio_ses_featp,
00110                                    args->lstio_ses_ndinfo,
00111                                    args->lstio_ses_namep,
00112                                    args->lstio_ses_nmlen);
00113 }
00114 
00115 static int
00116 lst_debug_ioctl(lstio_debug_args_t *args)
00117 {
00118         char   *name   = NULL;
00119         int     client = 1;
00120         int     rc;
00121 
00122         if (args->lstio_dbg_key != console_session.ses_key)
00123                 return -EACCES;
00124 
00125         if (args->lstio_dbg_resultp == NULL)
00126                 return -EINVAL;
00127 
00128         if (args->lstio_dbg_namep != NULL && /* name of batch/group */
00129             (args->lstio_dbg_nmlen <= 0 ||
00130              args->lstio_dbg_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE))
00131                 return -EINVAL;
00132 
00133         if (args->lstio_dbg_namep != NULL) {
00134                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_dbg_nmlen + 1);
00135                 if (name == NULL)
00136                         return -ENOMEM;
00137 
00138                 if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_dbg_namep,
00139                                        args->lstio_dbg_nmlen)) {
00140                         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_dbg_nmlen + 1);
00141 
00142                         return -EFAULT;
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 name[args->lstio_dbg_nmlen] = 0;
00146         }
00147 
00148         rc = -EINVAL;
00149 
00150         switch (args->lstio_dbg_type) {
00151         case LST_OPC_SESSION:
00152                 rc = lstcon_session_debug(args->lstio_dbg_timeout,
00153                                           args->lstio_dbg_resultp);
00154                 break;
00155 
00156         case LST_OPC_BATCHSRV:
00157                 client = 0;
00158         case LST_OPC_BATCHCLI:
00159                 if (name == NULL)
00160                         goto out;
00161 
00162                 rc = lstcon_batch_debug(args->lstio_dbg_timeout,
00163                                         name, client, args->lstio_dbg_resultp);
00164                 break;
00165 
00166         case LST_OPC_GROUP:
00167                 if (name == NULL)
00168                         goto out;
00169 
00170                 rc = lstcon_group_debug(args->lstio_dbg_timeout,
00171                                         name, args->lstio_dbg_resultp);
00172                 break;
00173 
00174         case LST_OPC_NODES:
00175                 if (args->lstio_dbg_count <= 0 ||
00176                     args->lstio_dbg_idsp == NULL)
00177                         goto out;
00178 
00179                 rc = lstcon_nodes_debug(args->lstio_dbg_timeout,
00180                                         args->lstio_dbg_count,
00181                                         args->lstio_dbg_idsp,
00182                                         args->lstio_dbg_resultp);
00183                 break;
00184 
00185         default:
00186                 break;
00187         }
00188 
00189 out:
00190         if (name != NULL)
00191                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_dbg_nmlen + 1);
00192 
00193         return rc;
00194 }
00195 
00196 static int
00197 lst_group_add_ioctl(lstio_group_add_args_t *args)
00198 {
00199         char           *name;
00200         int             rc;
00201 
00202         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00203                 return -EACCES;
00204 
00205         if (args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL||
00206             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00207             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00208                 return -EINVAL;
00209 
00210         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00211         if (name == NULL)
00212                 return -ENOMEM;
00213 
00214         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_grp_namep,
00215                            args->lstio_grp_nmlen)) {
00216                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen);
00217                 return -EFAULT;
00218         }
00219 
00220         name[args->lstio_grp_nmlen] = 0;
00221 
00222         rc = lstcon_group_add(name);
00223 
00224         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00225 
00226         return rc;
00227 }

00229 static int
00230 lst_group_del_ioctl(lstio_group_del_args_t *args)
00231 {
00232         int     rc;
00233         char   *name;
00234 
00235         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00236                 return -EACCES;
00237 
00238         if (args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL ||
00239             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00240             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00241                 return -EINVAL;
00242 
00243         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00244         if (name == NULL)
00245                 return -ENOMEM;
00246 
00247         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_grp_namep,
00248                            args->lstio_grp_nmlen)) {
00249                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00250                 return -EFAULT;
00251         }
00252 
00253         name[args->lstio_grp_nmlen] = 0;
00254 
00255         rc = lstcon_group_del(name);
00256 
00257         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00258 
00259         return rc;
00260 }
00261 
00262 static int
00263 lst_group_update_ioctl(lstio_group_update_args_t *args)
00264 {
00265         int     rc;
00266         char   *name;
00267 
00268         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00269                 return -EACCES;
00270 
00271         if (args->lstio_grp_resultp == NULL ||
00272             args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL ||
00273             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00274             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00275                 return -EINVAL;
00276 
00277         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00278         if (name == NULL)
00279                 return -ENOMEM;
00280 
00281         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_grp_namep,
00282                            args->lstio_grp_nmlen)) {
00283                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00284                 return -EFAULT;
00285         }
00286 
00287         name[args->lstio_grp_nmlen] = 0;
00288 
00289         switch (args->lstio_grp_opc) {
00290         case LST_GROUP_CLEAN:
00291                 rc = lstcon_group_clean(name, args->lstio_grp_args);
00292                 break;
00293 
00294         case LST_GROUP_REFRESH:
00295                 rc = lstcon_group_refresh(name, args->lstio_grp_resultp);
00296                 break;
00297 
00298         case LST_GROUP_RMND:
00299                 if (args->lstio_grp_count  <= 0 ||
00300                     args->lstio_grp_idsp == NULL) {
00301                         rc = -EINVAL;
00302                         break;
00303                 }
00304                 rc = lstcon_nodes_remove(name, args->lstio_grp_count,
00305                                          args->lstio_grp_idsp,
00306                                          args->lstio_grp_resultp);
00307                 break;
00308 
00309         default:
00310                 rc = -EINVAL;
00311                 break;
00312         }
00313 
00314         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00315 
00316         return rc;
00317 }
00318 
00319 static int
00320 lst_nodes_add_ioctl(lstio_group_nodes_args_t *args)
00321 {
00322         unsigned feats;
00323         int     rc;
00324         char   *name;
00325 
00326         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00327                 return -EACCES;
00328 
00329         if (args->lstio_grp_idsp == NULL || /* array of ids */
00330             args->lstio_grp_count <= 0 ||
00331             args->lstio_grp_resultp == NULL ||
00332             args->lstio_grp_featp == NULL ||
00333             args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL ||
00334             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00335             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00336                 return -EINVAL;
00337 
00338         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00339         if (name == NULL)
00340                 return -ENOMEM;
00341 
00342         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_grp_namep,
00343                                args->lstio_grp_nmlen)) {
00344                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00345 
00346                 return -EFAULT;
00347         }
00348 
00349         name[args->lstio_grp_nmlen] = 0;
00350 
00351         rc = lstcon_nodes_add(name, args->lstio_grp_count,
00352                               args->lstio_grp_idsp, &feats,
00353                               args->lstio_grp_resultp);
00354 
00355         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00356         if (rc == 0 &&
00357             copy_to_user(args->lstio_grp_featp, &feats, sizeof(feats))) {
00358                 return -EINVAL;
00359         }
00360 
00361         return rc;
00362 }
00363 
00364 static int
00365 lst_group_list_ioctl(lstio_group_list_args_t *args)
00366 {
00367         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00368                 return -EACCES;
00369 
00370         if (args->lstio_grp_idx   < 0 ||
00371             args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL ||
00372             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00373             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00374                 return -EINVAL;
00375 
00376         return lstcon_group_list(args->lstio_grp_idx,
00377                               args->lstio_grp_nmlen,
00378                               args->lstio_grp_namep);
00379 }
00380 
00381 static int
00382 lst_group_info_ioctl(lstio_group_info_args_t *args)
00383 {
00384         char           *name;
00385         int             ndent;
00386         int             index;
00387         int             rc;
00388 
00389         if (args->lstio_grp_key != console_session.ses_key)
00390                 return -EACCES;
00391 
00392         if (args->lstio_grp_namep == NULL ||
00393             args->lstio_grp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00394             args->lstio_grp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00395                 return -EINVAL;
00396 
00397         if (args->lstio_grp_entp  == NULL && /* output: group entry */
00398             args->lstio_grp_dentsp == NULL)  /* output: node entry */
00399                 return -EINVAL;
00400 
00401         if (args->lstio_grp_dentsp != NULL) { /* have node entry */
00402                 if (args->lstio_grp_idxp == NULL || /* node index */
00403                     args->lstio_grp_ndentp == NULL) /* # of node entry */
00404                         return -EINVAL;
00405 
00406                 if (copy_from_user(&ndent, args->lstio_grp_ndentp,
00407                                    sizeof(ndent)) ||
00408                     copy_from_user(&index, args->lstio_grp_idxp,
00409                                    sizeof(index)))
00410                         return -EFAULT;
00411 
00412                 if (ndent <= 0 || index < 0)
00413                         return -EINVAL;
00414         }
00415 
00416         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00417         if (name == NULL)
00418                 return -ENOMEM;
00419 
00420         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_grp_namep,
00421                            args->lstio_grp_nmlen)) {
00422                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00423                 return -EFAULT;
00424         }
00425 
00426         name[args->lstio_grp_nmlen] = 0;
00427 
00428         rc = lstcon_group_info(name, args->lstio_grp_entp,
00429                                &index, &ndent, args->lstio_grp_dentsp);
00430 
00431         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_grp_nmlen + 1);
00432 
00433         if (rc != 0)
00434                 return rc;
00435 
00436         if (args->lstio_grp_dentsp != NULL &&
00437             (copy_to_user(args->lstio_grp_idxp, &index, sizeof(index)) ||
00438              copy_to_user(args->lstio_grp_ndentp, &ndent, sizeof(ndent))))
00439                 return -EFAULT;
00440 
00441         return 0;
00442 }
00443 
00444 static int
00445 lst_batch_add_ioctl(lstio_batch_add_args_t *args)
00446 {
00447         int             rc;
00448         char           *name;
00449 
00450         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00451                 return -EACCES;
00452 
00453         if (args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL ||
00454             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00455             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00456                 return -EINVAL;
00457 
00458         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00459         if (name == NULL)
00460                 return -ENOMEM;
00461 
00462         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_bat_namep,
00463                            args->lstio_bat_nmlen)) {
00464                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00465                 return -EFAULT;
00466         }
00467 
00468         name[args->lstio_bat_nmlen] = 0;
00469 
00470         rc = lstcon_batch_add(name);
00471 
00472         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00473 
00474         return rc;
00475 }

00477 static int
00478 lst_batch_run_ioctl(lstio_batch_run_args_t *args)
00479 {
00480         int             rc;
00481         char           *name;
00482 
00483         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00484                 return -EACCES;
00485 
00486         if (args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL ||
00487             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00488             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00489                 return -EINVAL;
00490 
00491         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00492         if (name == NULL)
00493                 return -ENOMEM;
00494 
00495         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_bat_namep,
00496                            args->lstio_bat_nmlen)) {
00497                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00498                 return -EFAULT;
00499         }
00500 
00501         name[args->lstio_bat_nmlen] = 0;
00502 
00503         rc = lstcon_batch_run(name, args->lstio_bat_timeout,
00504                               args->lstio_bat_resultp);
00505 
00506         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00507 
00508         return rc;

00511 static int
00512 lst_batch_stop_ioctl(lstio_batch_stop_args_t *args)
00513 {
00514         int             rc;
00515         char           *name;
00516 
00517         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00518                 return -EACCES;
00519 
00520         if (args->lstio_bat_resultp == NULL ||
00521             args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL ||
00522             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00523             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00524                 return -EINVAL;
00525 
00526         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00527         if (name == NULL)
00528                 return -ENOMEM;
00529 
00530         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_bat_namep,
00531                            args->lstio_bat_nmlen)) {
00532                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00533                 return -EFAULT;
00534         }
00535 
00536         name[args->lstio_bat_nmlen] = 0;
00537 
00538         rc = lstcon_batch_stop(name, args->lstio_bat_force,
00539                                args->lstio_bat_resultp);
00540 
00541         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00542 
00543         return rc;
00544 }

00546 static int
00547 lst_batch_query_ioctl(lstio_batch_query_args_t *args)
00548 {
00549         char   *name;
00550         int     rc;
00551 
00552         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00553                 return -EACCES;
00554 
00555         if (args->lstio_bat_resultp == NULL ||
00556             args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL ||
00557             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00558             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00559                 return -EINVAL;
00560 
00561         if (args->lstio_bat_testidx < 0)
00562                 return -EINVAL;
00563 
00564         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00565         if (name == NULL)
00566                 return -ENOMEM;
00567 
00568         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_bat_namep,
00569                            args->lstio_bat_nmlen)) {
00570                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00571                 return -EFAULT;
00572         }
00573 
00574         name[args->lstio_bat_nmlen] = 0;
00575 
00576         rc = lstcon_test_batch_query(name,
00577                                      args->lstio_bat_testidx,
00578                                      args->lstio_bat_client,
00579                                      args->lstio_bat_timeout,
00580                                      args->lstio_bat_resultp);
00581 
00582         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00583 
00584         return rc;
00585 }

00587 static int
00588 lst_batch_list_ioctl(lstio_batch_list_args_t *args)
00589 {
00590         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00591                 return -EACCES;
00592 
00593         if (args->lstio_bat_idx   < 0 ||
00594             args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL ||
00595             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00596             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00597                 return -EINVAL;
00598 
00599         return lstcon_batch_list(args->lstio_bat_idx,
00600                               args->lstio_bat_nmlen,
00601                               args->lstio_bat_namep);
00602 }
00603 
00604 static int
00605 lst_batch_info_ioctl(lstio_batch_info_args_t *args)
00606 {
00607         char           *name;
00608         int             rc;
00609         int             index;
00610         int             ndent;
00611 
00612         if (args->lstio_bat_key != console_session.ses_key)
00613                 return -EACCES;
00614 
00615         if (args->lstio_bat_namep == NULL || /* batch name */
00616             args->lstio_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00617             args->lstio_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00618                 return -EINVAL;
00619 
00620         if (args->lstio_bat_entp == NULL && /* output: batch entry */
00621             args->lstio_bat_dentsp == NULL) /* output: node entry */
00622                 return -EINVAL;
00623 
00624         if (args->lstio_bat_dentsp != NULL) { /* have node entry */
00625                 if (args->lstio_bat_idxp == NULL || /* node index */
00626                     args->lstio_bat_ndentp == NULL) /* # of node entry */
00627                         return -EINVAL;
00628 
00629                 if (copy_from_user(&index, args->lstio_bat_idxp,
00630                                        sizeof(index)) ||
00631                     copy_from_user(&ndent, args->lstio_bat_ndentp,
00632                                        sizeof(ndent)))
00633                         return -EFAULT;
00634 
00635                 if (ndent <= 0 || index < 0)
00636                         return -EINVAL;
00637         }
00638 
00639         LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00640         if (name == NULL)
00641                 return -ENOMEM;
00642 
00643         if (copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_bat_namep,
00644                            args->lstio_bat_nmlen)) {
00645                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00646                 return -EFAULT;
00647         }
00648 
00649         name[args->lstio_bat_nmlen] = 0;
00650 
00651         rc = lstcon_batch_info(name,
00652                             args->lstio_bat_entp, args->lstio_bat_server,
00653                             args->lstio_bat_testidx, &index, &ndent,
00654                             args->lstio_bat_dentsp);
00655 
00656         LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_bat_nmlen + 1);
00657 
00658         if (rc != 0)
00659                 return rc;
00660 
00661         if (args->lstio_bat_dentsp != NULL &&
00662             (copy_to_user(args->lstio_bat_idxp, &index, sizeof(index)) ||
00663              copy_to_user(args->lstio_bat_ndentp, &ndent, sizeof(ndent))))
00664                 rc = -EFAULT;
00665 
00666         return rc;
00667 }
00668 
00669 static int
00670 lst_stat_query_ioctl(lstio_stat_args_t *args)
00671 {
00672         int             rc;
00673         char           *name = NULL;
00674 
00675         /* TODO: not finished */
00676         if (args->lstio_sta_key != console_session.ses_key)
00677                 return -EACCES;
00678 
00679         if (args->lstio_sta_resultp == NULL)
00680                 return -EINVAL;
00681 
00682         if (args->lstio_sta_idsp != NULL) {
00683                 if (args->lstio_sta_count <= 0)
00684                         return -EINVAL;
00685 
00686                 rc = lstcon_nodes_stat(args->lstio_sta_count,
00687                                        args->lstio_sta_idsp,
00688                                        args->lstio_sta_timeout,
00689                                        args->lstio_sta_resultp);
00690         } else if (args->lstio_sta_namep != NULL) {
00691                 if (args->lstio_sta_nmlen <= 0 ||
00692                     args->lstio_sta_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00693                         return -EINVAL;
00694 
00695                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(name, args->lstio_sta_nmlen + 1);
00696                 if (name == NULL)
00697                         return -ENOMEM;
00698 
00699                 rc = copy_from_user(name, args->lstio_sta_namep,
00700                                     args->lstio_sta_nmlen);
00701                 if (rc == 0)
00702                         rc = lstcon_group_stat(name, args->lstio_sta_timeout,
00703                                                args->lstio_sta_resultp);
00704                 else
00705                         rc = -EFAULT;
00706 
00707         } else {
00708                 rc = -EINVAL;
00709         }
00710 
00711         if (name != NULL)
00712                 LIBCFS_FREE(name, args->lstio_sta_nmlen + 1);
00713         return rc;
00714 }
00715 
00716 static int lst_test_add_ioctl(lstio_test_args_t *args)
00717 {
00718         char            *batch_name;
00719         char            *src_name = NULL;
00720         char            *dst_name = NULL;
00721         void            *param = NULL;
00722         int             ret = 0;
00723         int             rc = -ENOMEM;
00724 
00725         if (args->lstio_tes_resultp == NULL ||
00726             args->lstio_tes_retp == NULL ||
00727             args->lstio_tes_bat_name == NULL || /* no specified batch */
00728             args->lstio_tes_bat_nmlen <= 0 ||
00729             args->lstio_tes_bat_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE ||
00730             args->lstio_tes_sgrp_name == NULL || /* no source group */
00731             args->lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00732             args->lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE ||
00733             args->lstio_tes_dgrp_name == NULL || /* no target group */
00734             args->lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen <= 0 ||
00735             args->lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen > LST_NAME_SIZE)
00736                 return -EINVAL;
00737 
00738         if (args->lstio_tes_loop == 0 || /* negative is infinite */
00739             args->lstio_tes_concur <= 0 ||
00740             args->lstio_tes_dist <= 0 ||
00741             args->lstio_tes_span <= 0)
00742                 return -EINVAL;
00743 
00744         /* have parameter, check if parameter length is valid */
00745         if (args->lstio_tes_param != NULL &&
00746             (args->lstio_tes_param_len <= 0 ||
00747              args->lstio_tes_param_len >
00748              PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - sizeof(lstcon_test_t)))
00749                 return -EINVAL;
00750 
00751         LIBCFS_ALLOC(batch_name, args->lstio_tes_bat_nmlen + 1);
00752         if (batch_name == NULL)
00753                 return rc;
00754 
00755         LIBCFS_ALLOC(src_name, args->lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen + 1);
00756         if (src_name == NULL)
00757                 goto out;
00758 
00759         LIBCFS_ALLOC(dst_name, args->lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen + 1);
00760         if (dst_name == NULL)
00761                 goto out;
00762 
00763         if (args->lstio_tes_param != NULL) {
00764                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(param, args->lstio_tes_param_len);
00765                 if (param == NULL)
00766                         goto out;
00767                 if (copy_from_user(param, args->lstio_tes_param,
00768                                    args->lstio_tes_param_len)) {
00769                         rc = -EFAULT;
00770                         goto out;
00771                 }
00772         }
00773 
00774         rc = -EFAULT;
00775         if (copy_from_user(batch_name, args->lstio_tes_bat_name,
00776                            args->lstio_tes_bat_nmlen) ||
00777             copy_from_user(src_name, args->lstio_tes_sgrp_name,
00778                            args->lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen) ||
00779             copy_from_user(dst_name, args->lstio_tes_dgrp_name,
00780                            args->lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen))
00781                 goto out;
00782 
00783         rc = lstcon_test_add(batch_name,
00784                             args->lstio_tes_type,
00785                             args->lstio_tes_loop,
00786                             args->lstio_tes_concur,
00787                             args->lstio_tes_dist, args->lstio_tes_span,
00788                             src_name, dst_name, param,
00789                             args->lstio_tes_param_len,
00790                             &ret, args->lstio_tes_resultp);
00791 
00792         if (ret != 0)
00793                 rc = (copy_to_user(args->lstio_tes_retp, &ret,
00794                                        sizeof(ret))) ? -EFAULT : 0;
00795 out:
00796         if (batch_name != NULL)
00797                 LIBCFS_FREE(batch_name, args->lstio_tes_bat_nmlen + 1);
00798 
00799         if (src_name != NULL)
00800                 LIBCFS_FREE(src_name, args->lstio_tes_sgrp_nmlen + 1);
00801 
00802         if (dst_name != NULL)
00803                 LIBCFS_FREE(dst_name, args->lstio_tes_dgrp_nmlen + 1);
00804 
00805         if (param != NULL)
00806                 LIBCFS_FREE(param, args->lstio_tes_param_len);
00807 
00808         return rc;
00809 }
00810 
00811 int
00812 lstcon_ioctl_entry(unsigned int cmd, struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr *hdr)
00813 {
00814         char   *buf;
00815         struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data;
00816         int     opc;
00817         int     rc;
00818 
00819         if (cmd != IOC_LIBCFS_LNETST)
00820                 return -EINVAL;
00821 
00822         data = container_of(hdr, struct libcfs_ioctl_data, ioc_hdr);
00823 
00824         opc = data->ioc_u32[0];
00825 
00826         if (data->ioc_plen1 > PAGE_CACHE_SIZE)
00827                 return -EINVAL;
00828 
00829         LIBCFS_ALLOC(buf, data->ioc_plen1);
00830         if (buf == NULL)
00831                 return -ENOMEM;
00832 
00833         /* copy in parameter */
00834         if (copy_from_user(buf, data->ioc_pbuf1, data->ioc_plen1)) {
00835                 LIBCFS_FREE(buf, data->ioc_plen1);
00836                 return -EFAULT;
00837         }
00838 
00839         mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
00840 
00841         console_session.ses_laststamp = cfs_time_current_sec();
00842 
00843         if (console_session.ses_shutdown) {
00844                 rc = -ESHUTDOWN;
00845                 goto out;
00846         }
00847 
00848         if (console_session.ses_expired)
00849                 lstcon_session_end();
00850 
00851         if (opc != LSTIO_SESSION_NEW &&
00852             console_session.ses_state == LST_SESSION_NONE) {
00853                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "LST no active session\n");
00854                 rc = -ESRCH;
00855                 goto out;
00856         }
00857 
00858         memset(&console_session.ses_trans_stat, 0, sizeof(lstcon_trans_stat_t));
00859 
00860         switch (opc) {
00861         case LSTIO_SESSION_NEW:
00862                 rc = lst_session_new_ioctl((lstio_session_new_args_t *)buf);
00863                 break;
00864         case LSTIO_SESSION_END:
00865                 rc = lst_session_end_ioctl((lstio_session_end_args_t *)buf);
00866                 break;
00867         case LSTIO_SESSION_INFO:
00868                 rc = lst_session_info_ioctl((lstio_session_info_args_t *)buf);
00869                 break;
00870         case LSTIO_DEBUG:
00871                 rc = lst_debug_ioctl((lstio_debug_args_t *)buf);
00872                 break;
00873         case LSTIO_GROUP_ADD:
00874                 rc = lst_group_add_ioctl((lstio_group_add_args_t *)buf);
00875                 break;
00876         case LSTIO_GROUP_DEL:
00877                 rc = lst_group_del_ioctl((lstio_group_del_args_t *)buf);
00878                 break;
00879         case LSTIO_GROUP_UPDATE:
00880                 rc = lst_group_update_ioctl((lstio_group_update_args_t *)buf);
00881                 break;
00882         case LSTIO_NODES_ADD:
00883                 rc = lst_nodes_add_ioctl((lstio_group_nodes_args_t *)buf);
00884                 break;
00885         case LSTIO_GROUP_LIST:
00886                 rc = lst_group_list_ioctl((lstio_group_list_args_t *)buf);
00887                 break;
00888         case LSTIO_GROUP_INFO:
00889                 rc = lst_group_info_ioctl((lstio_group_info_args_t *)buf);
00890                 break;
00891         case LSTIO_BATCH_ADD:
00892                 rc = lst_batch_add_ioctl((lstio_batch_add_args_t *)buf);
00893                 break;
00894         case LSTIO_BATCH_START:
00895                 rc = lst_batch_run_ioctl((lstio_batch_run_args_t *)buf);
00896                 break;
00897         case LSTIO_BATCH_STOP:
00898                 rc = lst_batch_stop_ioctl((lstio_batch_stop_args_t *)buf);
00899                 break;
00900         case LSTIO_BATCH_QUERY:
00901                 rc = lst_batch_query_ioctl((lstio_batch_query_args_t *)buf);
00902                 break;
00903         case LSTIO_BATCH_LIST:
00904                 rc = lst_batch_list_ioctl((lstio_batch_list_args_t *)buf);
00905                 break;
00906         case LSTIO_BATCH_INFO:
00907                 rc = lst_batch_info_ioctl((lstio_batch_info_args_t *)buf);
00908                 break;
00909         case LSTIO_TEST_ADD:
00910                 rc = lst_test_add_ioctl((lstio_test_args_t *)buf);
00911                 break;
00912         case LSTIO_STAT_QUERY:
00913                 rc = lst_stat_query_ioctl((lstio_stat_args_t *)buf);
00914                 break;
00915         default:
00916                 rc = -EINVAL;
00917         }
00918 
00919         if (copy_to_user(data->ioc_pbuf2, &console_session.ses_trans_stat,
00920                          sizeof(lstcon_trans_stat_t)))
00921                 rc = -EFAULT;
00922 out:
00923         mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
00924 
00925         LIBCFS_FREE(buf, data->ioc_plen1);
00926 
00927         return rc;
00928 }
